00312     /* Single particle. Private implementation class. */
00313     class Particle
00314     {
00315     public:
00316         float                                       time;
00317         float                                       life;
00318         float                                       rot;
00319         float                                       elasticity;
00320         ParticleSystem_Integral<float>              size;
00321         ParticleSystem_Integral<NS(math,float3)>    color;
00322         ParticleSystem_Integral<float>              alpha;
00323         ParticleSystem_Integral<float>              rotspeed;
00324         int                                         frame;
00325         NS(math,float3)                             velocity;
00326         NS(math,float3)                             position;
00327         NS(math,float3x3)                           userRot; // world space
00328     };
00329 
00330     /* Single emission from the particle system. Contains many particles. Private implementation class. */
00331     class Emission
00332     {
00333     public:
00334         float                   time;
00335         float                   stop;
00336         float                   life;
00337         float                   newParticles;
00338         NS(math,float3)         position;
00339         NS(lang,Array)<Particle>    particles;
00340     };
